articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex 
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex dynamically advancing in the van of the drive for a great surge.
					 He went round the Second Steel Shop, the Hot Rolled Shop and the Hot Rolled Products Finishing Shop and various other production processes for hours to acquaint himself in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					 Feasting his eyes for a long while on the structural steel being churned out from the modern curved type strand-casting machine and large blooming mills at work, he warmly encouraged the workers there in their labor drive.
					
					 It is a great success that the Party members and other workers of the complex have made energetic endeavors to thoroughly establish the Juche iron production system based on the Korean style furnace while steadily increasing the production of iron and steel, thereby laying a solid material and technical foundation for the production of iron and steel, he said, highly praising them for bringing about uninterrupted advances and innovations without a moment's stagnation and marking time. 
					
					 Noting that the nonuse of coke and coal gasification, a process strictly relying on raw materials and resources found in abundance in the country are the invariable principle which does not allow even the slightest concession in the nation's economic development, he underscored the need to hold fast to this line as an invariable lifeline in the economic construction as its truth and vitality have been proved in the arduous struggle.
					
					 The most important task facing the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex is to keep the production of pig iron and steel going at a high rate in reliance upon the solid Juche iron production base and decisively boost the production of rolled steel, in particular, he pointed out. 
					
					 It is of particular importance to put in a bold and big way overall production processes on a modern and CNC basis in order to keep the production of iron and steel going at a high rate at the complex, he noted, setting forth new militant tasks to be fulfilled by the complex to do so.
					
					 Underlining the need to enlist the efforts of powerful technical groups of the country including the State Academy of Sciences and Kim Chaek University of Technology for the purpose of putting the complex on a modern and CNC basis on the highest level in a short span of time, he indicated an orientation and ways to do so and showed such deep care as unraveling knotty problems on the spot.
					
					 He called on the Party organizations and officials to pay deep attention to the supply service for the workers to provide them with better living conditions.
					
					 He stressed the need for the Party members and other working people of the complex to continue dashing ahead in the van of the drive for a great surge by giving full play to their indomitable mental power. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il also visited the July 7 Complex and the Chongjin Chemical Fiber Mill to learn in detail about the technical updating and production there and indicate tasks and ways for drastically increasing the production of chemical fiber and varieties of chemical products.
					
					 He highly praised the officials and other workers and technicians of the July 7 Complex and the Chongjin Chemical Fiber Mill for having laid a foundation for boosting the production of chemical products to a high level through a dynamic mass technical innovation movement.
					
					 North Hamgyong Province should naturally lead the drive for a new and great revolutionary surge as it has a large contingent of workers, he noted, stressing the need for the Party and working people's organizations, administrative and economic bodies and leading officials in the province to scrupulously conduct the organizational and political work in keeping with a high degree of enthusiasm of the masses and thus bring about fresh great leaps forward and signal innovations in the metal, chemical and machine-building industries and all other fronts of economic construction.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C. C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by KPA Art Squad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by KPA Art Squad 
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed together with servicepersons of KPA Large Combined Unit 264 an art performance given by its art squad.
					 The art squad put on the stage chorus "Soldiers Live Near the General", male quartet "It Is Offensive", female solo and pangchang "A Soldier Hears Rice Ears Sway", poem and chorus "We Will Defend the Leadership of the Revolution at the Cost of Our Lives" and other colorful numbers of various genres.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the invincible might of the KPA which has grown to be a matchless army under the loving care of the great brilliant commander and the unshakable faith and will of the service personnel of the KPA to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, remaining loyal to the Party.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance high in artistry and rich in ideological contents the members of the art squad presented, reflecting the spirit of the army of Songun Korea fully ready to annihilate the enemy. He highly appreciated the success made by them in the performance and extended thanks to them.
					
					 He praised them for their revolutionary work style, saying that the members of the art squad are sharing weal and woe with soldiers and conducting militant performing activities as befitting the artistes of the revolutionary army, thus instilling conviction of sure victory and optimism and will and courage to wipe out the enemy into servicepersons.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for all the art squads in intensifying their performing activities as required by the era of Songun.
					
					 Among the audience were Department Directors of the Central Committee of the WPK Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors of the C.C., the WPK Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: KAPPC: Resumption of Tour Depends on S. Side's Attitude
articles.content:
KAPPC: Resumption of Tour Depends on S. Side's Attitude
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are now becoming evermore vicious in their anti-DPRK nuclear row and "sanctions" against it, while openly disclosing their sinister intention to make the issue of resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang and Kaesong area serve their purposes. 
					 A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued a statement Thursday in this regard.
					
					  There is no need for our side to sit at the negotiating table with the authorities of the south side any longer now that it has done all it can guarantee the tour of Mt. Kumgang and Kaesong area at the level of its authorities, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 By nature the above-said tour started according to the contract between the said committee and Hyundai. Therefore, there is no ground whatsoever for the authorities of the south side to meddle in the issue and say this or that over it. 
					
					 The south Korean tourists should be allowed to visit famous beauty spots of the nation no matter how the anti-reunification conservative group may try to block it.
					
					 We cannot leave the world famous beauty spots unvisited any longer now that there is an increasing request in south Korea and overseas for the tour of them.
					
					 Hence, we solemnly declare, as we had already clarified, that we would open the door to the tour of Kaesong area from March and that of Mt. Kumgang from April. 
					
					 Conveniences and safety will be fully provided for the compatriots entering the area of our side from the south to tour Mt. Kumgang and the area of Kaesong.   
					
					 The south Korean authorities' persistent blocking of the tour under far-fetched pretexts would compel our side to take decisive measures.
					
					 These measures may include the abrogation of all agreements and contracts on the tour provided by our side to the south side as special benefits, the freezing of real estates of the south side in the tourist areas and other matters. 
					
					 Wether the road of the above-said tour is opened to the compatriots in the south or not will depend on the attitude of the authorities of the south side.
					
					  They will be held wholly accountable for all the consequences to be entailed by the failure to resume the tour.

articles.title: CPRK Rebukes Japanese Sankei's False Report about DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Rebukes Japanese Sankei's False Report about DPRK 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards an extremely mean and clumsy misinformation released by the Japanese Sankei Shimbun recently to hurt the DPRK:
					 On March 3 the paper posted on its Internet a report that there took place a "food robbery" in the northern region of the DPRK, claiming that the Information Center for Solidarity with NK Intellectuals, made up of such human scum as traitors and defectors to the south, obtained the "information from local inhabitants." The information center is under the patronage of the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the above-said paper even asserted that the incident occurred on February 16 in a bid to make the story about the "incident" sound politically plausible. 
					
					 What Sankei Shimbun reported is a sheer fabrication. No train loaded with food had ever passed through the said area the day it claimed the "incident" took place and before and after that day. Moreover, there occurred no such incident as "food robbery."
					
					 The people of the DPRK are now out in the dynamic all-out charge to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation under the great Songun leadership and their single-minded unity has grown stronger than ever before.
					
					 All kinds of wild rumors spread by tricksters are nothing but ridiculous rhetoric let loose by those who are afraid of the might of Songun and the single-minded unity in the DPRK and displeased with the victorious advance of the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Great irony is that the Sankei Shimbun is so nervous about gathering misinformation about the DPRK that it chose to echo the nonsensical talk made by human scum, lost to shame.
					
					 But no one would lend an ear to the above-said misinformation.
					
					 Those keen on the smear campaign will have to pay a dear price for their wrong doings.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- City and county mass rallies took place in different parts of the DPRK to thoroughly implement the joint calls issued by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK.
					 Attending them were leading officials of local party and power bodies, economic organs and working people's organizations, working people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Reporters and speakers at the rallies stressed that the joint calls are a militant banner arousing all the servicepersons and people to the general offensive as they indicated the tasks for the victory in the gigantic drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					To improve the people's standard of living is an important work for implementing the behests of President Kim Il Sung and carrying into reality General Secretary Kim Jong Il's ideals which are to make the Korean people enjoy all blessings under the socialist system, they said, expressing the resolution to bring about a decisive turn in the improvement of people's standard of living this significant year by giving free rein to the mental power of the masses.
					
					 They underlined the need for the party members and other working people to make collective innovations at every worksite, bearing deep in mind the militant appeal of the WPK that calls for adorning this year marking the 65th birthday of the WPK as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of the country and as a year of prosperity in which the people enjoy happiness to the full.

articles.title: New Bio-microscope Introduced in Teaching
articles.content:
New Bio-microscope Introduced in Teaching
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A modified version of bio-microscope combined with CCD (Charge Coupled Device) and computer, developed by Kim Chaek University of Technology, has been introduced in teaching at secondary schools in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, including Pyongyang Secondary School No.1.
					 The microscope helps a teacher observe a student's experiment together with other students and give a correct explanation and valuation of its results through computer.
					
					 Detailed experiment on minute particles is also available with the microscope.
					
					 Conspicuous in the device are application programs of database, experiment observation, result account and the like.

articles.title: World-famous Korean Painting "Leopard"
articles.content:
World-famous Korean Painting "Leopard" 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean painting "Leopard" is a typical work of Kim Hong Do, a celebrated Korean painter in the 18th century.
					 The work, 109 centimeters long and 67 centimeters wide, depicts an unfolded leopard fur, symmetrical about its backbone line.
					
					 It gives a vivid representation of its thick hairs as well as large and small black spots with thin brushes, giving fine effects of light and shade.
					
					 The lifelike depiction reflects diversified drawing methods of the Korean painting and Kim's earnest working attitude and outstanding talents of skillfully applying different techniques and methods proper to subjects.
					
					 It is now on display at the Korean Art Gallery not only as a cultural asset of Korea but a treasure of the world.

articles.title: Anti-reunification Remarks of S. Korean Minister Flayed
articles.content:
Anti-reunification Remarks of S. Korean Minister Flayed
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, minister of "Unification" of south Korea, impudently prattled in a "commemorative address" on Tuesday that "the inter-Korean relations are now improving" and "south Korea has successfully led the relations" over the last two years, clamoring that the "immediate task is to put these relations on the right track."
					 He also talked rubbish, bringing up the nuclear issue in the inter-Korean relations again, that it is the "spirit of the times and practical task assigned to the Ministry of Unification to move toward cooperation, going beyond the nuclear issue."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed commentary denounces those remarks as a vivid expression of the conservative group's unpardonable treacherous scheme to completely restore the past era of confrontation while totally denying the inter-Korean relations in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself", which calls for rejecting outside forces and achieving the independent reunification by the united efforts of the entire nation, is serving as the spirit of the times in the June 15 era of reunification at present, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 But, Hyon dared assert sycophancy, treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen, quite contrary to the idea, to be the "spirit of the times". It reveals that this traitor has neither an iota of national self-respect nor the slightest concept of fellow countrymen.
					
					 What further enrages one is the fact that he agitated his underlings not to "worry or hurry up" in the inter-Korean relations, calling for "adherence to principle".
					
					 He played the leading role in delaying the improvement of the inter-Korean relations desired by all fellow countrymen in two years. Not content with it, he has made such agitation this time. This goes to evidently prove that he is a diehard traitor who is dead-set against the reunification.
					
					 The improvement of the inter-Korean relations can never be expected as long as such anti-reunification traitors are allowed to stay in south Korea as Hyon In Thaek who justifies the anti-reunification policy of confrontation and seeks to enforce it in a more wicked way, swimming against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Giving Full Play to Revolutionary Spirit of Self-reliance Called for
articles.content:
Giving Full Play to Revolutionary Spirit of Self-reliance Called for
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially calls on all the officials and party members and other working people to give higher play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and thus strikingly demonstrate once again the heroic spirit of Songun Korea that has ushered in the era of great prosperity by its own efforts. 
					 Self-reliance is the mode of making revolution peculiar to the army and people of the DPRK who live and struggle guided by the Juche idea, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 To advance under the uplifted banner of self-reliance is an important requirement for achieving greater victory in the present gigantic drive based on the shining successes and experience gained in the struggle for great surge.
					
					 To give fuller play to the spirit of self-reliance in all fields and units is an urgent requirement for bringing about a decisive turn in the economic construction and in improving people's standard of living this year by turning to good account the economic foundation and potentials. 
					
					 Tremendous are the foundation and potentials of the self-supporting economy of the DPRK as they have been built in the struggle of the Songun revolution under the experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Korean people are strong in creativity as they are possessed of brave fighting spirit and modern science and technology by which they create everything from nothing and valiantly push back the frontiers of science. The national economy of the DPRK has been made more Juche-oriented and modern and was put on a higher level. Unlimited are the DPRK's intellectual and material potentials some of which have already been created and some have not yet been developed. Auspicious events pleasing all the people including the start of mass production of vinalon have taken place one after another this year, too, in the wake of last year. This fact proves how great potentials the DPRK's self-supporting economic foundation has.
					
					 The officials and party members and other working people should wage a dynamic drive for a great surge in the spirit of self-reliance on all fronts with conviction and optimism about the future of a thriving nation, the editorial appeals.

articles.title: Youth in S. Korea Called upon to Take Lead in Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Youth in S. Korea Called upon to Take Lead in Reunification Movement
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released an appeal on Feb. 26 calling upon the youth and students to take the lead in the reunification movement. 
					 The appeal deplored that everything is going back to the period before the publication of the June 15 joint declaration due to the present authorities' anti-reunification acts and confrontation. The youth and students should widely introduce the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and its validity and vitality, deeply aware of them, and should not tolerate any act of denying them, the appeal noted.
					
					 It called upon all the youth and students to take the lead in the actions for opening the nationwide common events on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It, at the same time, urged the youth and students to turn out as one in the anti-war and peace movement for the prosperity common to the nation and the peace on the Korean Peninsula and boost the solidarity with the youth and students in the north and abroad.
					
					 It stressed the need for everybody to unite close under the banner of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and take the lead in the dynamic reunification movement.

articles.title: Pomminryon in US Holds 2010 Meeting
articles.content:
Pomminryon in US Holds 2010 Meeting
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) held a 2010 meeting in Los Angeles on Feb. 27.
					 The organization recalled that it denounced the south Korean authorities for their sycophancy and treachery and fascist suppression last year and waged a strenuous struggle to get the "National Security Law" abolished and a peace treaty concluded on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It reiterated its will to conduct brisk activities for the peace and reunification of the peninsula this year marking the 20th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon.
					
					 The organization declared it would intensify the movement for putting an end to the fascist rule of the south Korean authorities and contribute to preserving and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 It also called on the Koreans in the U.S. to strengthen their organization and pool efforts to conduct dynamic actions for the independence and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: US-S. Korean War Maneuver Denounced by KFA British Branch
articles.content:
US-S. Korean War Maneuver Denounced by KFA British Branch
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on Feb. 26 in denunciation of the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers to launch a war.
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are planning to stage from March 8 reveal that the "dialogue" touted so far by the U.S. imperialists and their followers is nothing but a sheer lie, the statement charged, adding:
					
					 This saber-rattling is aimed at violating the sovereignty of the DPRK and bringing down the socialist system in the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The branch fully supports the statement released by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army on Feb. 25.
					
					 We demand the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique cancel the plan for the exercises and the U.S. pull back its forces from south Korea at once.
					
					 We call upon all the branches of the KFA to intensify the movement for solidarity with the DPRK.

articles.title: Iranian Figure on Improvement of Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Iranian Figure on Improvement of Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il is an ever-victorious iron-willed party and a tested and experienced one that leads to victory the Korean people's struggle against the U.S. and for national reunification and the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					 Hossein Kashefi, president of the Central Council of the Iran Parties House, said this when meeting the DPRK ambassador to Iran who paid a farewell call on him on Feb. 24.
					
					 We are pleased to have friendly relations with such party as the WPK, militant and authoritative, he said, adding:
					
					 Both Iranian people and the Korean people are the comrades-in-arms fighting on the common front of the struggle against the U.S. and other imperialist forces keen to dominate other countries.
					
					 It is one of the main purposes of our party's activities to unite and boost solidarity with the people of those independent and anti-U.S. countries as the Korean people. 
					
					 Iran fully supports the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 I will make positive efforts to boost the relations between the Iran Parties House and the WPK in the days ahead.

articles.title: Reinicio del turismo depende de la parte Sur, senala portavoz del CCPAP
articles.content:
Reinicio del turismo depende de la parte Sur, senala portavoz del CCPAP
						
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 4 una declaracion con respecto a que las autoridades surcoreanas tienen el siniestro intento de convertir el problema de reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong en el objeto de regateo para su campana nuclear y de "sancion" anti-RPDC que endurecen cada vez mas.
					Ya que nuestra parte (la RPDC) dio a nivel de autoridades todas las garantias necesarias para el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong, no hay motivo de sentarnos a dialogar mas con las autoridades surcoreanas, senala el documento y continua:
					
					Desde el principio, el turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong se ha realizado segun el contrato entre el CCPAP y Hyundai. Por eso, las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen ninguna razon para entrometerse en ese asunto.
					
					  La ruta del turismo de los compatriotas surcoreanos deseosos de ver los lugares famosos de la nacion no debera ser bloqueada por culpa de la camarilla de los conservadores anti-reunificacion. 
					
					  Puesto que en el interior y el exterior del pais crecen cada dia mas los pedidos del turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong, no podemos tener abandonados indefinidamente estos famosos lugares de talla mundial.
					
					  Por eso, declaramos solemnemente que como ya hemos anunciado, abriremos las puertas del turismo a la zona de Kaesong desde marzo y al monte Kumgang desde abril.
					
					  Seran garantizadas perfectamente las comodidades y la seguridad personal de los compatriotas surcoreanos que entren en nuestra parte para el turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong.
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas siguen bloqueando el camino del turismo recurriendo a las insistencias absurdas, nos veremos obligados a tomar las medidas resueltas.
					
					  En estas seran incluidas la quiebra de todos los acuerdos y contratos sobre las labores turisticas, contraidos dando preferencias a la parte Sur, la congelacion de bienes inmuebles de esta en las areas turisticas, entre otros problemas.
					
					  Ahora, el problema de la apertura o no del camino turistico al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong depende de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas tendran que asumir todas las consecuencias y responsabilidades que emanen del no reinicio del turismo.

articles.title: CRPP rechaza la desinformacion de Sankei Shimbun
articles.content:
CRPP rechaza la desinformacion de Sankei Shimbun
						
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con la recien difundida desinformacion de Sankei Shimbun de Japon contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria respondio el dia 4 como lo siguiente:
					  El pasado dia 3, Sankei Shimbun (via Internet) trascendio el "incidente de salteamiento de alimentos" supuestamente ocurrido en la region septentrional de Corea citando la "informacion recogida de los moradores en el lugar de los hechos" por una entidad llamada "Centro de informacion de la alianza de intelectuales NK" que integran las basuras humanas como los traidores y fugitivos instigados por los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					  Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que ese medio de prensa japones trato de atribuir el matiz politico a ese "caso" describiendo como si esto hubiera ocurrido el 16 de febrero.
					
					  Tal version de Sankei Shimbun deviene un embuste absurdamente inventado.
					
					  Ningun tren cargado de alimentos habia pasado por la polemica zona en el dia arriba mencionado ni antes ni despues.
					
					Ademas, no ha ocurrido en ninguna parte el llamado "caso de salteamiento de alimentos".
					
					  Ahora, el pueblo coreano se levanto con energia en la ofensiva general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera bajo la gran direccion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar) y nuestra unidad monolitica se consolida mas ferreamente que nunca.
					
					  Los rumores ideados por los conspiradores no pasan de ser disparates de quienes temen al poderio del Songun y la unidad monolitica de la RPDC y no desean la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Lo mas ridiculo es el comportamiento de la prensa japonesa que avida de las desinformaciones anti-RPDC, llego a hacerse eco de los chismes de dichas basuras humanas, a que nadie hace caso, sin guardar siquiera su decoro.
					
					  Nadie prestara oidos a tales "desinformaciones" tan pueriles y viles que no valen ni un comino.
					
					  Los que se dedican a los sucios complots tendran que pagar sus crimenes.

articles.title: Direccion en EE.UU. de APRP aboga por luchar por reunificacion
articles.content:
Direccion en EE.UU. de APRP aboga por luchar por reunificacion
						
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Direccion en Estados Unidos de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) realizo el 27 de febrero en Los Angeles la reunion anual de 2010.
					  La entidad se refirio a que en el ano pasado, libro tenazmente la lucha por denunciar los actos vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias y la represion fascista de las autoridades surcoreanas, abolir la "ley de seguridad" y concertar el convenio de paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Expuso la decision de dinamizar la lucha por la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana en el presente ano del 20o aniversario de la fundacion de la APRP.
					
					  Apunto que libraria con dinamismo el movimiento por acabar con el dominio fascista de las autoridades surcoreanas y destaco la importancia de ejecutar cabalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana.
					
					  Exhorto a fortalecer la organizacion y luchar activamente por la independencia, la paz y la reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas unidas de los compatriotas residentes en EE.UU.

articles.title: Entidad inglesa condena maniobras belicas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Entidad inglesa condena maniobras belicas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- La sucursal de Gran Bretana de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea (AAC) con sede en Espana dio a luz el 26 de febrero una declaracion condenando las maniobras de guerra de los imperialistas estadounidenses y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos.
					El documento senala que los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", que Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas seguidoras decidieron librar a partir del 8 de marzo, comprueban lo fraudulento del "dialogo" de que ellos vinieron hablando tanto hasta ahora.
					
					El objetivo de dichos ejercicios militares deviene violar la soberania de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y atropellar el sistema socialista de ella con las fuerzas armadas, revela la nota y prosigue:
					
					La AAC apoya totalmente la declaracion del portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea publicada el 25 de febrero.
					
					Demandamos a los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos abandonar ahora mismo su intento de librar los ejercicios "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" y a las tropas norteamericanas retirarse ahora mismo del suelo surcoreano.
					
					Exhortamos a todas las sucursales de la AAC a intensificar el movimiento de solidaridad con la RPDC.

articles.title: Personalidad irani se refiere a relaciones con el PTC
articles.content:
Personalidad irani se refiere a relaciones con el PTC
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- Hossein Kashefi, presidente del Consejo Central de la Casa de los Partidos Politicos de Iran, se reunio el dia 24 de febrero con el embajador coreano en su pais quien le hizo una visita de despedida.
					En la ocasion el presidente senalo que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, fundado por el Presidente    Kim Il Sung y dirigido por Su Excelencia           Kim Jong Il, es un invencible partido de acero y partido veterano y probado que orienta a la victoria la lucha del pueblo coreano contra EE.UU. y por la reunificacion de la patria y la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Es un gran placer tener relaciones de amistad con el partido combativo y prestigioso como el PTC, dijo y continuo:
					
					Los pueblos de Iran y Corea son companeros de armas que luchan en el mismo frente contra EE.UU. y otras fuerzas imperialistas que intentan dominar a otros paises.
					
					Uno de los objetivos principales de las actividades de nuestro partido es realizar la unidad y fortalecer la solidaridad con los pueblos de los paises que luchan contra EE.UU. y por la independencia como el pueblo coreano.
					
					Iran apoya totalmente la propuesta de Corea de concertar el convenio de la paz.
					
					Por ultimo, senalo que se esforzara dinamicamente por desarrollar las relaciones entre la Casa de los Partidos Politicos de Iran y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
